data.name: ThrowHelper_FieldDoesNotExistOnType

data.name: ThrowHelper_SubscriptionExecutor_ContextInvalidState_Message

data.value: Subscription queries must have exactly one root field.

data.name: ThrowHelper_SubscriptionExecutor_NoSubscribeResolver_Message
data.value: You must declare a subscribe resolver for subscription fields.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ResolverContext_LiteralsNotSupported_Message
data.value: The ArgumentValue method on the resolver context only allows for runtime values. If you want to retrieve the argument value as GraphQL literal use the ArgumentLiteral method instead.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ResolverContext_CannotConvertArgument_Message
data.value: Unable to convert the value of the argument `{0}` to `{1}`. Check if the requested type is correct or register a custom type converter.

data.value: There was no argument with the name `{0}` found on the field `{1}`.

data.value: There are no operations in the GraphQL document.

data.value: The operation name can only be omitted if there is just one operation in a GraphQL document.
